1181870.name: Even For Eternia: Blue Diamond
1181870.description:
"I held a beautiful blue flower in my hand. But then it was crushed when I tried to caress it.

It shattered like glass, much like the fragile wall of humanity's hearts.

I could not side with them, but I could not side against them. I am trapped between the wall between love and hate.

My friends betrayed me for what I became. My tale is one woven, spindled in sadness, hatred, disgust, and hatred for the humans that grew to hate me. But I knew in that hatred that I could change them.

And that's what being a God means."

• The final chapter to the Even For Eternia saga.
• 3 additional hours of gameplay.
